Caption: Anatomy part 1 - Inside the door: pulley at top, override‑cable bracket below it, retaining ring on the cable shaft, Hiron lock assembly seated inside the lock housing, and the removable white access‑panel cover.
Anatomy part 2 - Frame view: green rubber bumper cushions the door, teal RFID mounting block aligns the reader, and cast‑metal striker on the jamb mates with the lock bolt.

Anatomy part 3 - Lock cartridge: yellow override cable runs the length of the module, purple snap‑clip secures the cable eye, and detachable extension at the bottom routes the cable toward the pulley.
